DOC.brief_title: Comparison Total Parathyroidectomy With Without Autotransplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Secondary hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) common disorder patient chronic kidney disease . It cause permanent stimulation orthotopic heterotopic parathyroid tissue due phosphate retention , hypocalcemia , vitamin D insufficiency . Despite initiation new therapeutic agent , several patient require parathyroidectomy.There three option surgical treatment SHPT : subtotal PTX ( 3.5-gland resection , SPTX ) , total PTX autotransplantation ( TPTX+AT ) , total PTX without autotransplantation ( TPTX ) .SPTX TPTX+AT leave fragment activate , proliferate parathyroid tissue.Since pathophysiological condition chronic renal failure maintenance dialysis continue , growth stimulus persists may cause recurrent sHPT.The SPTX procedure less likelihood non-functioning remnant , recurrent disease always require neck reoperation carry high likelihood recurrent laryngeal nerve palsy.Therefore surgeon believe TPTX+AT good procedure patient SHPT . Because potential complication permanent hypocalcemia adynamic bone disease , TPTX introduce clinical practice.However , recent retrospective study demonstrate patient TPTX develop permanent hypoparathyroidism adynamic bone disease initially expected.Postoperative hypocalcemia temporary.TPTX may provide alternative strategy currently perform procedure mainly report low recurrence rates.An 8-year follow-up study show recurrence rate TPTX 7 % .Recurrence rate TPTX+AT 21.4 % , site recurrence locate approximately 80 % graft 20 % neck.However , present randomize controlled trial Compare effect total parathyroidectomy autotransplantation total parathyroidectomy without autotransplantation.The purpose study evaluate short-term long-term efficacy total parathyroidectomy without autotransplantation comparison total parathyroidectomy autotransplantation . Intervention : One hundred patient SHPT need undergo parathyroidectomy Second Hospital Anhui medical university select divide total parathyroidectomy without autotransplantation group total parathyroidectomy autotransplantation group , group contain 50 case . Results : 1 . Clinical data include : intact parathyroid hormone , serum calcium , serum phosphorus , calcium-phosphorus product , hemoglobin , operation time , morbidity , mortality , clinical symptom sign , recurrence reoperation , quality life score . 2 . Statistical method : group t-test , analysis variance use .
DOC.criteria: Both male female , age 18 old ; Intact parathyroid hormone ( iPTH ) 9 time upper limit normal range ( 600pg/ml ) , hypercalcemia hyperphosphatemia ; Refractory medical therapy ; Provided write informed consent . Primary tertiary hyperparathyroidism ; Familial hyperparathyroidism ( MENⅠ , MENⅡ , hereditary HPT ) ; Neck surgical exploration history ; Parathyroid malignant tumor .
